name: Egg Hunt (itch) (Henry_Hamster)
description:
A game made for the Mini Jam 99: Birds. The limitation for the jam was "Can't stop moving" and I interpreted it as a platformer in which one can only jump and change direction (Walking is automatic).  This is my second ever attended game jam (First was ScoreSpace #17). I did have less time than usual because of Chinese New Year, but I still managed to finish.

NOTE: Walking off a platform does not consume your jump and you can jump mid-air.

Gameplay Controls:

You(the chicken) automatically walk in the direction you are facing 

D or Right arrow key to face right.

A or Left arrow key to face left.

Space  or W or Up arrow key to jump.

Gameplay Elements:

'Lightning bolt' powerup increases speed for a duration.

'Wing' powerup gives you an extra jump (will not be consumed if the player can already jump).

Laser tile periodically shoots a long piercing laser through terrain.

Spike tiles kill the chicken/player.

Sawblades move between two positions in a interpolating pattern.

Slime bounces the player up and does not consume a jump.

Arrow is cosmetic.

Team: Myself, and N/A   (Just me)

Used assets: 

Music from opengameart.org. (Not commissioned for this project)
